title: Jobberman Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape jobs from Jobberman.com listings. Provide either keyword/location OR a Jobberman search URL (startUrl, url, or startUrls). Actor paginates and optionally scrapes detail pages.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Jobberman.com search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of Keyword/Location.

keyword.title: Keyword (if not using Start URL)
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Software Developer', 'Marketing Manager', 'Data Analyst', 'Nurse', 'Sales Representative'.

location.title: Location (if not using Start URL)
location.description: Geographic location to search in, e.g., 'Lagos', 'Abuja', 'Port Harcourt', 'Ibadan', 'Kano'.

posted_date.title: Posted Date (if not using Start URL)
posted_date.description: Filter jobs by how recently they were posted.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens job detail pages for full description/salary.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy for the best results.

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string. Can help bypass consent banners.
